title: Cheese and ham muffins
ingredients: ['2 mini salamis, finely sliced', '100g shaved ham, finely sliced', '100g grated mild Cheddar cheese', '100g grated mature Cheddar cheese', '100g grated Parmesan or Pecorino Romano cheese', '200g frozen sweetcorn kernels', '2 eggs', '150g margarine', '125ml milk', '125g self-raising flour']
